message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate the enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering its value to me.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective on the value. To find a middle ground, I'm proposing $13,000. This feels like a fair compromise that acknowledges its true worth.

I appreciate your willingness to find a middle ground, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing $11,000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
